That's okay Yan. Please call me Jeremiah, or Jeremy, or Jer, anything
but Rdahl :)

BIC:

Speedbreaker frowned at his miss, but he was determined. He readied his
body against the edge of the hill, and took aim again, firing his
Breakdown gun twice. "Drag Strip, Dead-End, help me out" he shouted.

Beastbox hopped up to the top of the hill with precise agility, and
fired twice from both shoulder cannons at Incinerator.
